dc:title: Why Write About Strife and Violence?
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Calls attention to the social crisis, class warfare, and numerous strikes. Notes how Communists practice the corporal works of mercy while lukewarm, comfortable, and indifferent Catholics turn their backs on strikers and their families.
